1:
Rejoice in Yahweh, you righteous;\q praise is appropriate for the upright.
\q
2:
Give thanks to Yahweh with the harp;\q sing praises to him with the harp of ten strings.
\q
3:
Sing to him a new song;\q play skillfully and sing with joy.


\q
4:
For Yahweh's word is upright,\q and everything he does is fair.
\q
5:
He loves righteousness and justice.\q The earth is full of Yahweh's covenant faithfulness.
\q
6:
By the word of Yahweh the heavens were made,\q and all the stars were made by the breath of his mouth.


\q
7:
He gathers the waters of the sea together like a heap;\q he puts the oceans in storehouses.
\q
8:
Let the whole earth fear Yahweh;\q let all the inhabitants of the world stand in awe of him.
\q
9:
For he spoke, and it was done;\q he commanded, and it stood in place.



\q
10:
Yahweh frustrates the alliances of nations;\q he overrules the plans of the peoples.
\q
11:
The plans of Yahweh stand forever,\q the plans of his heart for all generations.
\q
12:
Blessed is the nation whose God is Yahweh,\q the people whom he has chosen as his own inheritance.


\q
13:
Yahweh looks from heaven;\q he sees all the people.
\q
14:
From the place where he lives,\q he looks down on all who live on the earth.
\q
15:
He who shapes the hearts of them all\q observes all their deeds.


\q
16:
No king is saved by a vast army;\q a warrior is not saved by his great strength.
\q
17:
A horse is a false hope for victory;\q in spite of his great strength, he cannot rescue.


\q
18:
See, Yahweh's eye is on those who fear him,\q on those who hope in his covenant faithfulness
\q
19:
to deliver their lives from death\q and to keep them alive in times of famine.


\q
20:
We wait for Yahweh;\q he is our help and our shield.
\q
21:
Our hearts rejoice in him,\q for we trust in his holy name.


\q
22: Let your covenant faithfulness, Yahweh, be with us\q as we put our hope in you.
